title: Fortune magazine font?
content:
Hi,

I wonder if anyone knows what font Fortune Magazine uses in  
some headlines, I also believe that Burger King uses the same font. (I've tried Soho std and it was pretty close)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fortune.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215224253/http:/typophile.com/files/fortune.jpg) | 129.26 KB |
author: ollepaulsson

comments.content: Also, Rockwell will get you close.
